availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jeptha David Robinson (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Franklin County native. Married Elizabeth Williams Robinson on September 30, 1847. Father of David O. Robinson, Joseph Austin Robinson, Jabez Robinson, Hettie Robinson, Ruth Robinson, Susan Robinson and Urban Robinson. Employed as a farmer in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in 1850. Employed as a farmer in 1860 and 1870.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #266,200, p.60

“Jeptha D. Robinson,” Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, Ky.), July 23, 1892, p. 6.
